title: PM Modi to inaugurate India AI Impact Expo 2026 on Monday
description: The India AI Impact Expo 2026 will be held from February 16 to 20 alongside the India AI Impact Summit and is envisioned as a national showcase of artificial intelligence in action, bringing together policy, innovation, and large-scale implementation under one platform.
content:

title: US, UK universities open offshore campuses in Mumbai; programmes, fees, intake explained
description:
International universities allowed by the University Grants Commission to set up offshore campuses in Mumbai have begun accepting applications for their first cohort, marking a significant step in the country's push to attract global higher-education brands.
Amid tightening of immigration laws by many countries, such transnational education with universities operating both domestic and offshore campuses offers a practical and forward-looking alternative, a university representative noted.
These universities, which will offer undergraduate programmes ranging from computer science, artificial intelligence, economics to business administration and creative industries for annual fees of Rs 12-18 lakh and postgraduate courses for up to Rs 20 lakh, plan to open for the 2026 fall intake (Aug-Sept) in Mumbai. Most are setting up campuses in the eastern suburbs in and around Vikhroli and Powai.
content:
Image used for representational purpose only.

title: Montana poised to be epicenter of AI revolution
description: While Montana might not be viewed as an artificial intelligence hotbed, it is considered among the top states in the country with potential to "power the AI revolution." An analysis CNBC published last July based on grid reliability and average market electricity price named Montana as the No. 3 state in the country for its potential to power data centers. Despite that, only a handful of relatively small data centers have been built in the Treasure State, and several operations have come and gone.

title: Decoded: AI buzzwords everyone talks about
description: Artificial intelligence is rapidly changing industries and daily life. As a major summit approaches in New Delhi, understanding key AI terms is crucial. This guide explains concepts like Large Language Models and Generative AI. It also covers practical applications and potential issues such as AI bias and hallucinations. The focus is on demystifying AI for everyone.
